p: By choosing a base mesh polymer, it can be easily designed to have improved mechanical properties, biocompatibility and cellular response, which makes mesh a good medical product in the nanocomposite materials sector. The electrospinning creates a macroporous scaffolding containing randomly oriented or aligned nanofibres on which the drug is placed. Electrospun nanofiber scaffolds provide the optimal environment for vaccinated cells [ 88]. Therapeutic compounds such as lipophilic and hydrophilic drugs, proteins, antimicrobials, etc. can be incorporated into the polymer nanofiber mesh by using monoaxial or coaxial electrospinning [ 106].
